mapper.select: select notice_no, mem_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_views, notice_date, notice_Status from notice where notice_Status = 'Y' order by notice_no desc
select faq_no, faq_title, faq_content, faq_Status from faq where faq_Status = 'Y' order by faq_no
select count(*) from notice where notice_Status = 'Y'
select count(*) from faq where faq_Status = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into notice ( notice_no ,mem_id ,notice_title ,notice_content ,notice_views ,notice_date ,notice_status ) values ( seq_nono.nextval ,#{memId} ,#{noticeTitle} ,#{noticeContent} ,default ,sysdate ,default )
mapper.select: select notice_no, mem_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_views, notice_date, notice_Status from notice where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
select faq_no, faq_title, faq_content, faq_Status from faq where faq_no = #{faqNo}
mapper.update: update notice set NOTICE_STATUS = 'N' where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
update faq set faq_status = 'N' where faq_no = #{faqNo}
mapper.insert: insert into faq ( faq_no ,faq_title ,faq_content ,faq_status ) values ( seq_fano.nextval ,#{faqTitle} ,#{faqContent} ,'Y' )
mapper.update: update notice set notice_views = notice_views+1 where notice_no =#{noticeNo} and notice_status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select NOTICEREPLY_NO, NOTICE_COMMENT, COMMENT_WRITER, COMMENT_CREATE_DATE from noticereply where NOTICEREPLY_NO = #{noticeNo} order by comment_create_date desc
